description: Swiggy is one of India's largest on-demand delivery platforms, offering food delivery, Instamart groceries, Swiggy Genie pickup & drop service, and restaurant discovery.

faqs.question: What does Swiggy do?
faqs.answer: Swiggy is an on-demand delivery platform offering food delivery from restaurants, instant grocery delivery via Instamart, and pickup & drop services via Swiggy Genie.

faqs.question: Does Swiggy offer grocery delivery?
faqs.answer: Yes. Swiggy offers instant grocery delivery through Swiggy Instamart, available in most major cities in India.

faqs.question: Is there a delivery fee?
faqs.answer: Delivery fees vary based on distance, restaurant demand, and time of day. Swiggy One subscribers get free delivery on eligible orders.

faqs.question: Does Swiggy have a subscription plan?
faqs.answer: Yes. Swiggy One is Swiggy’s membership plan which offers free delivery, discounted fees, and benefits across food, Instamart, and Genie services.

faqs.question: What is Swiggy One?
faqs.answer: Swiggy One is a paid subscription that provides unlimited free deliveries, lower service fees, and exclusive discounts across Swiggy services.

faqs.question: How does Swiggy Genie work?
faqs.answer: Swiggy Genie is a pickup and drop service. You can send packages, documents, or small items to any location within the city using a Swiggy delivery partner.

faqs.question: Is Swiggy available in my city?
faqs.answer: Swiggy is available in more than 500 cities across India, including all major metropolitan and tier-1 cities.

faqs.question: Do you offer restaurant partnerships?
faqs.answer: Yes. Restaurants can partner with Swiggy to list their menu online, receive orders, and use Swiggy’s delivery network.

faqs.question: How can I contact support?
faqs.answer: You can contact Swiggy support through the in-app Help section for order, payment, or delivery issues.

pricing.delivery_fee: Varies by distance, peak hours, and restaurant.
